00022 
00023 struct code_block_s;
00024 
00025 TAILQ_HEAD(code_block_list_s, code_block_s);
00026 struct code_block_s
00027 {
00028     TAILQ_ENTRY(code_block_s) np; /* next & prev pointers                   */
00029     char *buf;
00030     size_t sz;
00031     size_t code_line;
00032     const char *file_in;
00033 };
00034 
00035 typedef struct code_block_s code_block_t;
00036 typedef struct code_block_list_s code_block_list_t;
00037 
00038 struct lang_c_ctx_s
00039 {
00040     code_block_list_t code_blocks;
00041     trans_info_t *ti;
00042     size_t html_block_cnt;
00043 };
00044 
00045 typedef struct lang_c_ctx_s lang_c_ctx_t;
00046 
00047 static const char copyright_hdr[] =
00048     "/*\n"
00049     " * Copyright (c) 2005, 2006, 2006 by KoanLogic s.r.l. <http://www.koanlogic.com>\n"
00050     " * All rights reserved.\n"
00051     " *\n"
00052     " * This file is part of KLone, and as such it is subject to the license\n"
00053     " * stated in the LICENSE file which you have received as part of this\n"
00054     " * distribution\n"
00055     " *\n"
00056     " */\n";
00057 
00058 static void free_code_block(code_block_t *node)
00059 {
00060     if(node)
00061     {
00062         U_FREE(node->buf);
00063         U_FREE(node);
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 static void free_code_blocks(lang_c_ctx_t *ctx)
00068 {
00069     code_block_t *node;
00070     code_block_list_t *head;
00071 
00072     dbg_ifb (ctx == NULL) return;
00073 
00074     head = &ctx->code_blocks;
00075     
00076     while((node = head->tqh_first) != NULL)
00077     {
00078         TAILQ_REMOVE(head, node, np);
00079         free_code_block(node);
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 static int push_code_block(lang_c_ctx_t *ctx, parser_t *p, 
00084     const char *buf, size_t sz)
00085 {
00086     code_block_t *node;
00087     
00088     dbg_return_if (p == NULL, ~0);
00089     dbg_return_if (ctx == NULL, ~0);
00090  
00091     node = (code_block_t*)u_zalloc(sizeof(code_block_t));
00092     dbg_err_if(node == NULL);
00093 
00094     node->sz = sz;
00095     node->buf = (char*)u_malloc(sz);
00096     dbg_err_if(node->buf == NULL);
00097 
00098     node->code_line = p->code_line;
00099     node->file_in = ctx->ti->file_in;
00100 
00101     memcpy(node->buf, buf, sz);
00102 
00103     TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&ctx->code_blocks, node, np);
00104 
00105     return 0;
00106 err:
00107     if(node)
00108         free_code_block(node);
00109     return ~0;
00110 }
00111 
00112 static void print_header(parser_t *p, lang_c_ctx_t *ctx)
00113 {
00114     static const char dfun_prefix[] = "page_";
00115     const char *file;
00116     char *dfun;
00117     int i;
00118 
00119     dbg_ifb (p == NULL) return;
00120     dbg_ifb (ctx == NULL) return;
00121 
00122     (void)ctx;
00123 
00124     io_printf(p->out, "%s", copyright_hdr);
00125     io_printf(p->out, "#include <klone/emb.h>\n");
00126     io_printf(p->out, "#include <klone/dypage.h>\n");
00127 
00128     file = ctx->ti->uri + strlen(ctx->ti->uri) - 1;
00129 
00130     for(; *file != '/' && file >= ctx->ti->uri; --file)
00131             ;
00132 
00133     io_printf(p->out, "static const char *SCRIPT_NAME = \"%s\";\n", 
00134                 ++file);
00135 
00136     dfun = ctx->ti->dfun; /* shortcut */
00137 
00138     /* we need a prefix to avoid errors with pages whose filename starts with
00139        a number (404-handler.kl1) or any other char not allowed by C as the
00140        first char of function names */
00141     strlcpy(dfun, dfun_prefix, strlen(dfun_prefix));
00142 
00143     if(strlcat(dfun, file, URI_BUFSZ) >= URI_BUFSZ)
00144         dfun[URI_BUFSZ - 1] = 0;
00145 
00146     for(i = 0; i < strlen(dfun); ++i)
00147         if(!isalnum(dfun[i]))
00148             dfun[i] = '_'; /* just a-zA-Z0-9 allowed */
00149 
00150     /* add a dummy function that the user can use to set a breakpoint when
00151        entering the page code. the "static volatile" variable is used to avoid
00152        the compiler to optimize-out (inlining) the function call */
00153     io_printf(p->out, 
00154             "static int %s (void) { "
00155             "static volatile int dummy; return dummy; }\n", dfun);
00156 
00157     io_printf(p->out, 
00158         "static request_t *request = NULL;\n"
00159         "static response_t *response = NULL;\n"
00160         "static session_t *session = NULL;\n"
00161         "static io_t *in = NULL;\n"
00162         "static io_t *out = NULL;\n");
00163  
00164 }
00165 
00166 static int print_var_definition(parser_t *p, int comp, const char *varname, 
00167         const char *buf, size_t bufsz)
00168 {
00169     codec_t *zip = NULL;
00170     io_t *ios = NULL;
00171     int rc, i;
00172     unsigned char c;
00173 
00174     dbg_err_if(p == NULL);
00175     dbg_err_if(varname == NULL);
00176     dbg_err_if(buf == NULL);
00177 
00178     /* create an io_t around the HTML block */
00179     dbg_err_if(io_mem_create((char*)buf, bufsz, 0, &ios));
00180 
00181 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZ
00182     /* if compression is enabled zip the data block */
00183     if(comp)
00184     {
00185         /* apply a gzip codec */
00186         dbg_err_if(codec_gzip_create(GZIP_COMPRESS, &zip));
00187         dbg_err_if(io_codec_add_tail(ios, zip));
00188         zip = NULL; /* io_free() will free the codec */
00189     }
00190 #endif
00191 
00192     io_printf(p->out, "static const char %s[] = {\n", varname);
00193 
00194     for(i = 1; (rc = io_getc(ios, (char*)&c)) > 0; ++i)
00195     {
00196         io_printf(p->out, "0x%02X, ", c);
00197         if(i % 12 == 0)
00198             io_printf(p->out, "\n");
00199     }
00200     dbg_err_if(rc < 0); /* input stream error */
00201 
00202     io_printf(p->out, "};\n");
00203 
00204     io_free(ios);
00205 
00206     return 0;
00207 err:
00208     if(zip)
00209         codec_free(zip);
00210     if(ios)
00211         io_free(ios);
00212     return ~0;
00213 }
00214 
00215 static void print_code_blocks(parser_t *p, lang_c_ctx_t *ctx)
00216 {
00217     code_block_t *node;
00218     code_block_list_t *head;
00219 
00220     dbg_ifb (p == NULL) return;
00221     dbg_ifb (ctx == NULL) return;
00222 
00223     io_printf(p->out, 
00224         "\n\n"
00225         "static void exec_page(dypage_args_t *args)\n"
00226         "{\n"
00227         "   request = args->rq;                       \n"
00228         "   response = args->rs;                      \n"
00229         "   session = args->ss;                      \n"
00230         "   in = request_io(request);           \n"
00231         "   out = response_io(response);        \n"
00232         "   u_unused_args(SCRIPT_NAME, request, response, session, in, out); \n"
00233         "   %s () ; \n ", ctx->ti->dfun
00234         );
00235 
00236     head = &ctx->code_blocks;
00237     for(node = head->tqh_first; node != NULL; node = node->np.tqe_next)
00238     {
00239         io_printf(p->out, "\n");
00240         io_write(p->out, node->buf, node->sz);
00241     }
00242 
00243     io_printf(p->out, 
00244             "goto klone_script_exit;\n" /* just to avoid a warning */
00245             "klone_script_exit:     \n"
00246             "   return;             \n"
00247             "}                      \n"
00248             );
00249 }
00250 
00251 static void print_static_page_block(io_t *out, lang_c_ctx_t *ctx)
00252 {
00253     dbg_ifb (out == NULL) return;
00254     dbg_ifb (ctx == NULL) return;
00255     dbg_ifb (ctx->ti == NULL) return;
00256  
00257     io_printf(out, 
00258         "static embfile_t e;                \n"
00259         "static void res_ctor(void)         \n"
00260         "{                                  \n"
00261         "   e.res.type = ET_FILE;           \n"
00262         "   e.res.filename = \"%s\";        \n"
00263         "   e.data = (unsigned char*)data;  \n"
00264         "   e.size = sizeof(data);          \n"
00265         "   e.file_size = %u;               \n"
00266         "   e.mime_type = \"%s\";           \n"
00267         "   e.mtime = %lu;                  \n"
00268         "   e.comp = %d;                    \n"
00269         "   e.encrypted = %d;               \n"
00270         "}                                  \n",
00271         ctx->ti->uri, 
00272          /* file_size will be == to size if the file is not compressed */
00273         ctx->ti->file_size, 
00274         u_guess_mime_type(ctx->ti->uri), 
00275         ctx->ti->mtime, 
00276         ctx->ti->comp,
00277         ctx->ti->encrypt);
00278 }
00279 
00280 static void print_dynamic_page_block(io_t *out, lang_c_ctx_t *ctx)
00281 {
00282     dbg_ifb (out == NULL) return;
00283     dbg_ifb (ctx == NULL) return;
00284     dbg_ifb (ctx->ti == NULL) return;
00285 
00286     io_printf(out, 
00287         "static embpage_t e;                \n"
00288         "static void res_ctor(void)         \n"
00289         "{                                  \n"
00290         "   e.res.type = ET_PAGE;           \n"
00291         "   e.res.filename = \"%s\";        \n"
00292         "   e.fun = exec_page;              \n"
00293         "}                                  \n",
00294         ctx->ti->uri);
00295 }
00296 
00297 static void print_register_block(io_t *out, lang_c_ctx_t *ctx)
00298 {
00299     char md5[MD5_DIGEST_BUFSZ];
00300 
00301     dbg_ifb (out == NULL) return;
00302     dbg_ifb (ctx == NULL) return;
00303     dbg_ifb (ctx->ti == NULL) return;
00304 
00305     u_md5(ctx->ti->uri, strlen(ctx->ti->uri), md5);
00306 
00307     io_printf(out, 
00308         "#ifdef __cplusplus                 \n"
00309         "extern \"C\" {                     \n"
00310         "#endif                             \n"
00311         "void module_init_%s(void);         \n" /* avoids a warning */
00312         "void module_init_%s(void)          \n"
00313         "{                                  \n"
00314         "    res_ctor();                    \n"
00315         "    emb_register((embres_t*)&e);   \n"
00316         "}                                  \n"
00317         "void module_term_%s(void);         \n" /* avoids a warning */
00318         "void module_term_%s(void)          \n"
00319         "{                                  \n"
00320         "    emb_unregister((embres_t*)&e); \n"
00321         "}                                  \n"
00322         "#ifdef __cplusplus                 \n"
00323         "}                                  \n"
00324         "#endif                             \n",
00325         md5, md5, md5, md5);
00326 }
00327 
00328 static int process_declaration(parser_t *p, void *arg, const char *buf, 
00329         size_t sz)
00330 {
00331     u_unused_args(arg);
00332 
00333     dbg_err_if (p == NULL);
00334 
00335     dbg_err_if(io_write(p->out, buf, sz) < 0);
00336 
00337     /* a newline is required after #includes or #defines */
00338     dbg_err_if(io_printf(p->out, "\n") < 0);
00339 
00340     return 0;
00341 err:
00342     return ~0;
00343 }
00344 
00345 static int process_expression(parser_t *p, void *arg, const char *buf, 
00346         size_t sz)
00347 {
00348     lang_c_ctx_t *ctx;
00349     const char before[] = "io_printf(out, \"%s\",";
00350     const char after[] = ");\n";
00351 
00352     dbg_err_if (p == NULL);
00353     dbg_err_if (arg == NULL);
00354 
00355     ctx = (lang_c_ctx_t*)arg;
00356     
00357     dbg_err_if(push_code_block(ctx, p, before, strlen(before)));
00358     dbg_err_if(push_code_block(ctx, p, buf, sz));
00359     dbg_err_if(push_code_block(ctx, p, after, strlen(after)));
00360 
00361     return 0;
00362 err:
00363     return ~0;
00364 }
00365 
00366 static int process_code(parser_t *p, void *arg, const char *buf, size_t sz)
00367 {
00368     lang_c_ctx_t *ctx;
00369 
00370     dbg_err_if (p == NULL);
00371     dbg_err_if (arg == NULL);
00372 
00373     ctx = (lang_c_ctx_t*)arg;
00374  
00375     dbg_err_if(push_code_block(ctx, p, buf, sz));
00376 
00377     return 0;
00378 err:
00379     return ~0;
00380 }
00381 
00382 static int translate_set_error(trans_info_t *ti, parser_t *p, const char *msg)
00383 {
00384     char file[U_FILENAME_MAX];
00385 
00386     dbg_err_if (ti == NULL);
00387     dbg_err_if (p == NULL || p->in == NULL);
00388  
00389     dbg_err_if(io_name_get(p->in, file, U_FILENAME_MAX));
00390 
00391     dbg_err_if(u_snprintf(ti->emsg, EMSG_BUFSZ, "[%s:%d] %s", 
00392         file, p->line, msg));
00393 
00394     return 0;
00395 err:
00396     return ~0;
00397 }
00398 
00399 static int cb_html_block(parser_t *p, void *arg, const char *buf, size_t sz)
00400 {
00401     enum { CODESZ = 128, VARNSZ = 32 };
00402     lang_c_ctx_t *ctx;
00403     char code[CODESZ];
00404     char varname[VARNSZ];
00405 
00406     dbg_err_if (p == NULL);
00407     dbg_err_if (arg == NULL);
00408 
00409     ctx = (lang_c_ctx_t*)arg;
00410 
00411     if(ctx->ti->comp)
00412     {   /* zip embedded HTML blocks */
00413         dbg_err_if(u_snprintf(varname, VARNSZ, "klone_html_zblock_%lu", 
00414             ctx->html_block_cnt));
00415 
00416         dbg_err_if(print_var_definition(p, 1 /* zip it */, varname, buf, sz));
00417 
00418         dbg_err_if(u_snprintf(code, CODESZ, 
00419             "\ndbg_if(u_io_unzip_copy(out, klone_html_zblock_%lu, "
00420             "   sizeof(klone_html_zblock_%lu)));\n", 
00421             ctx->html_block_cnt, ctx->html_block_cnt));
00422 
00423     } else {
00424         /* embedded HTML blocks will not be zipped */
00425         dbg_err_if(u_snprintf(varname, VARNSZ, "klone_html_%lu", 
00426             ctx->html_block_cnt));
00427 
00428         dbg_err_if(print_var_definition(p, 0, varname, buf, sz));
00429 
00430         dbg_err_if(u_snprintf(code, CODESZ, 
00431             "\ndbg_if(io_write(out, klone_html_%lu, "
00432             "   sizeof(klone_html_%lu)) < 0);\n", 
00433             ctx->html_block_cnt, ctx->html_block_cnt));
00434     }
00435 
00436     dbg_err_if(push_code_block(ctx, p, code, strlen(code)));
00437 
00438     ctx->html_block_cnt++;
00439 
00440     return 0;
00441 err:
00442     return ~0;
00443 }
00444 
00445 static int cb_code_block(parser_t *p, int cmd, void *arg, const char *buf, 
00446         size_t sz)
00447 {
00448     lang_c_ctx_t *ctx;
00449 
00450     dbg_err_if (p == NULL);
00451     dbg_err_if (arg == NULL);
00452 
00453     ctx = (lang_c_ctx_t *)arg;
00454 
00455     switch(cmd)
00456     {
00457     case 0: /* plain code block <% ... %> */
00458         process_code(p, arg, buf, sz);
00459         break;
00460     case '@': /* <%@ ... %> */
00461         dbg_err_if("the file should have already been preprocessed");
00462         break;
00463     case '!': /* <%! ... %> */
00464         process_declaration(p, arg, buf, sz);
00465         break;
00466     case '=': /* <%= ... %> */
00467         process_expression(p, arg, buf, sz);
00468         break;
00469     default:
00470         translate_set_error(ctx->ti, p, "bad command char after <%");
00471         warn_err("unknown code type");
00472     }
00473     return 0;
00474 err:
00475     return ~0;
00476 }
00477 
00478 /* translate a opaque file to a const char array */
00479 int translate_opaque_to_c(io_t *in, io_t *out, trans_info_t *ti)
00480 {
00481     lang_c_ctx_t ctx;
00482     int i = 0;
00483     ssize_t rc;
00484     unsigned char c;
00485 
00486     dbg_err_if (in == NULL);
00487     dbg_err_if (out == NULL);
00488     dbg_err_if (ti == NULL);
00489     
00490     memset(&ctx, 0, sizeof(lang_c_ctx_t));
00491     TAILQ_INIT(&ctx.code_blocks);
00492     ctx.ti = ti;
00493 
00494     io_printf(out, "%s", copyright_hdr);
00495     io_printf(out, "#include <klone/emb.h>\n");
00496 
00497     io_printf(out, "static const char data[] = {\n");
00498 
00499     for(i = 1; (rc = io_getc(in, (char*)&c)) > 0; ++i)
00500     {
00501         io_printf(out, "0x%02X, ", c);
00502         if(i % 12 == 0)
00503             io_printf(out, "\n");
00504     }
00505     dbg_err_if(rc < 0); /* input stream error */
00506 
00507     io_printf(out, "};\n");
00508 
00509     print_static_page_block(out, &ctx);
00510     print_register_block(out, &ctx);
00511 
00512     return 0;
00513 err:
00514     return ~0;
00515 }
00516 
00517 int translate_script_to_c(io_t *in, io_t *out, trans_info_t *ti)
00518 {
00519     parser_t *p = NULL;
00520     lang_c_ctx_t ctx;
00521 
00522     dbg_return_if (in == NULL, ~0);
00523     dbg_return_if (out == NULL, ~0);
00524     dbg_return_if (ti == NULL, ~0);
00525     
00526     /* init the context obj */
00527     memset(&ctx, 0, sizeof(lang_c_ctx_t));
00528     TAILQ_INIT(&ctx.code_blocks);
00529     ctx.ti = ti;
00530 
00531     /* create a parse that reads from in and writes to out */
00532     dbg_err_if(parser_create(&p));
00533 
00534     parser_set_io(p, in, out);
00535 
00536     parser_set_cb_arg(p, &ctx);
00537     parser_set_cb_code(p, cb_code_block);
00538     parser_set_cb_html(p, cb_html_block);
00539 
00540     print_header(p, &ctx);
00541 
00542     dbg_err_if(parser_run(p));
00543 
00544     print_code_blocks(p, &ctx);
00545 
00546     print_dynamic_page_block(p->out, &ctx);
00547 
00548     print_register_block(p->out, &ctx);
00549 
00550     free_code_blocks(&ctx);
00551 
00552     parser_free(p);
00553 
00554     return 0;
00555 err:
00556     free_code_blocks(&ctx);
00557     if(p)
00558         parser_free(p);
00559     return ~0;
00560 }
